post.author: aph0x``
post.body:
hi guys

i'm searching for a lwo_to_w3d file exporter/converter or anything which is working...i read several times that lightwave should have an inside w3d export but i can't find it in my lw8.5 ...

if someone knows a freeware or full sale plugin/converter which can handle my problem pls tell me .. i can't find anything:(

thx for any help

c
y
a

post.author: der_ton
post.body:
Shockwave w3d or CnC Generals/BFME 1/2 engine w3d?
I just happen to be working on a CnC Generals/BFME1/2 w3d importer for blender, and an exporter might be following afterwards. With that, you can import LWOs into blender and export as w3d.

post.author: aph0x``
post.body:
jep the cncgenerals/bfme w3d ... seems like there are no real converters damn it..

keep working on your import/export for blender ! and thx for info

c
y
a
